00000002 ; patadr, pattern address decimal 1000 (0x3e8)
00000042 ; 0x21 << 1
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; patclk, 0, redundant
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000008 ; 1us pulse, no meas. 100 loops & 2us T placed by PTN_BRNCH at 2us(tick 20)
0000000A ; 0x5 << 1
00000001
0000000A ; width, 100ns ticks, 1us(10 ticks)
00000000 
00000000
00000000 ; no meas flag
00000001 ; meas offset
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; Put branch at 2us for 2us period
00000040 ; PTN_CLK[20]
00000014
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000006 ; PTN_BRNCH
00000046 ; 23 << 1
00000000 ; Address(tick) to loop back, creates T=2us
00000000
00000064 ; Loop count
00000000
00000000 ; Meas skip
00000001 ; Meas stride
00000004 ; next, end pattern, patctl
00000044 ; 0x22 << 1 
00000010 ; PTN_END bit, d4
00000000
00000021 ; pattern ending address, not really used yet
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000

00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
